mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_phone,p.vegan_step, p.introduction, IFNULL(ph.photo_name, 'default_photo.jpg') AS photo_name, IFNULL(ph.photo_id, 0) AS photo_id FROM user u JOIN profile p ON u.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN photo ph ON p.user_id = ph.identify_number AND ph.photo_id = (SELECT MAX(photo_id) FROM photo WHERE identify_number = u.user_id) WHERE u.user_id = #{param1}
SELECT Count(user_id )FROM user WHERE user_id=#{param1} AND user_pw=#{param2}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile(user_id,introduction) VALUES(#{param1},#{param2}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE introduction = #{param2}
INSERT INTO photo(cat_id,ori_photo_name, photo_name,identify_number) VALUES('profilePhoto',#{param1},#{param2},#{param3}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE photo_name = #{param2}
mapper.select: SELECT c.cl_id,cj.user_id,c.cl_subject,c.cl_period,c.cl_deadlinePeriod,c.cl_deadline ,c.cl_teacher,c.cl_date,c.cl_ing_chk,c.cl_status,c.cl_content ,c.cl_id, cj.cl_part_id FROM class c JOIN class_join cj ON c.cl_id = cj.cl_id WHERE c.cl_id IN ( SELECT cl_id FROM class_join WHERE user_id = #{param1} );
SELECT rec_id, user_id, rec_title, rec_view FROM recipe where user_id=#{param1} ORDER BY rec_id DESC
SELECT photo.photo_name FROM recipe JOIN photo ON recipe.rec_id = photo.identify_number WHERE photo_number = 0 ORDER BY identify_number DESC
